message_1: Assuming you have a key value of 3, encrypt the message "HELLO WORLD" using Caesar cipher.
message_2:
To encrypt the message "HELLO WORLD" using a Caesar cipher with a key value of 3, shift each letter in the message 3 positions forward in the alphabet. If the shift goes beyond 'Z', wrap around to the beginning of the alphabet.

Here's the encryption process:

H -> K
E -> H
L -> O
L -> O
O -> R
(space remains unchanged)
W -> Z
O -> R
R -> U
L -> O
D -> G

The encrypted message is: "KHOOR ZRUOG"
